sentences.en: A biography is a form of narration.
Also easy to promote the imaginal memory and the narration spreads.
sentences.cn: 也容易促进形象记忆和讲述流传.

sentences.en: As the crew gets back from lunch, we can put your narration on it right away.
sentences.cn: 工作人员吃过午饭回来后，我们就能马上把你的解说加上去。

sentences.en: Different models of abstract criticism make different types of esthetic narration.
sentences.cn: 不同的抽象批判样式构成了不同的美学叙事.

sentences.en: From " Garden Path Sentence " to " Garden Path Narration "
sentences.cn: 从 “ 花园路句子 ” 到 “ 花园路叙事 ”

sentences.en: He has recorded the narration for the production.
sentences.cn: 他录制了这部作品的解说词。

sentences.en: Her narration, she said, was meant to be ironic and self-mocking — “I find it very funny, almost obtuse.
sentences.cn: 她的叙述，她说，本来是想讽刺和嘲笑自己的——“我觉得这很有趣，我觉得自己是如此愚钝”。

sentences.en: I need some good pictures for narration.
sentences.cn: 我需要一些叙述时用的好镜头。

sentences.en: It includes narration by some of the finest actors and academics of the last half century including Sam Waterston, Arthur Miller, and Shelby Foote.
sentences.cn: 该片中还有上半个世纪中优秀演员和专业学者像萨姆·沃森，亚瑟·米勒以及谢尔比·福特等的叙述。

sentences.en: Its narration is characterized by indeterminacy and fragmentation, combining with immanence.
sentences.cn: 小说的叙述特点有不确定性和片断化, 并与内在性相联系.

sentences.en: Its story-within-a-story method of narration is confusing.
sentences.cn: 其故事套故事的叙事方法让人觉得很糊涂。

sentences.en: Lk 9:28 - 36 at significant moments in the narration of Jesus'earthly life.
sentences.cn: 路九28-36),更是对耶稣早期生活的描述,有著重大的意义.

sentences.en: Narration should become a basic approach to preschool education.
sentences.cn: 叙事应是幼儿教育的基本途径.

sentences.en: So life narration is fundamental mode of narration in the novel.
sentences.cn: 生命叙事应该成为“人学”小说最基本最重要的叙事方式.

sentences.en: Studying the two person's narration by contrasting them is very helpful.
sentences.cn: 将那两个人的论述联属在一起对比着研究,对我们大有裨益.

sentences.en: The bare narration of the fact took two hours.
sentences.cn: 单是这事实的叙述就花了两小时.

sentences.en: The fifth part is about the application and effect of narration structure.
sentences.cn: 第五部分分析叙述结构理论在阅读教学中的应用及其作用.

sentences.en: The richness of his novel comes from his narration of it.
sentences.cn: 他小说的丰富多采得益于他的叙述.

words.tran_cn: 叙事的，叙述的；叙事体的

trans.tran_en: the act of telling a story
